H0.text: Cells are the basic units of the structure and function of living things.

H1.text: Molecules are the basic units of the structure and function of living things.

H2.text: Enzymes are the basic units of the structure and function of living things.

H3.text: Proteins are the basic units of the structure and function of living things.

A4.text: The cell is the basic structural and functional unit of all forms of life or organisms.
